DOC.brief_summary: RATIONALE : Studying sample tissue patient cancer laboratory may help doctor learn cancer development drug resistance patient . PURPOSE : This laboratory study examine tissue sample patient acute myeloid leukemia learn drug resistance patient .
DOC.brief_title: Studying Tissue Samples Learn More About Drug Resistance Patients With Acute Myeloid Leukemia
DOC.detailed_description: OBJECTIVES : - Ascertain whether assessment P-glycoprotein ( P-gp ) status use accumulation assay find great 10 % positive specimen among 30 specimen ( collected patient acute myeloid leukemia enrol clinical trial ECOG-E3999 ) find negative use efflux assay . OUTLINE : This multicenter study . Cryopreserved bone marrow specimen examine P-glycoprotein ( P-gp ) accumulation assay efflux assay use DiOC_2 dye . Flow cytometry use measure activity assay . PROJECTED ACCRUAL : A total 40 specimen accrue study .
DOC.criteria: DISEASE CHARACTERISTICS : Cryopreserved bone marrow specimen collect patient acute myeloid leukemia enrol clinical trial ECOGE3999 meeting follow criterion : Appreciable level either CD34+ OR CD117+ blast Appreciable stain antiPgp antibody 30 specimen must exhibit low moderate dye load Rh123 efflux assay 10 specimen must exhibit positive Rh123 efflux activity PATIENT CHARACTERISTICS : Not specify PRIOR CONCURRENT THERAPY : Not specify
